descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

collectionId.name: collectionId
collectionId.description: The ID of the collection to update
collectionId.ai_hint: The ID of the collection to update

link.name: link
link.description: Link of the bookmark to be created
link.ai_hint: Link of the bookmark to be created

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: collectionId
options.description: It's possible to restrict remove action to just one collection. It's optional. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

bookmarkId.name: bookmarkId
bookmarkId.description: The ID of the bookmark to update
bookmarkId.ai_hint: The ID of the bookmark to update

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

updateFields.name: updateFields

options.name: cover
options.description: Name of the binary property containing the data for the image to upload as a cover

options.name: public
options.description: Whether the collection will be accessible without authentication

options.name: parentId
options.description: ID of this collection's parent collection, if it is a child collection

options.name: sort
options.description: Descending sort order of this collection. The number is the position of the collection among all the collections with the same parent ID.

options.name: title
options.description: Title of the collection to update

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

title.name: title
title.description: Title of the collection to create
title.ai_hint: Title of the collection to create

type.name: type
type.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

tags.name: tags
tags.description: One or more tags to delete. Enter comma-separated values to delete multiple tags.
tags.ai_hint: One or more tags to delete. Enter comma-separated values to delete multiple tags.

filters.name: filters

options.name: collectionId
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

self.name: self
self.description: Whether to return details on the logged-in user

userId.name: userId
userId.description: The ID of the user to retrieve
userId.ai_hint: The ID of the user to retrieve

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'bookmark' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'bookmark' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'collectionId'
IF resource == 'bookmark' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'link'
IF resource == 'bookmark' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'bookmark' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'bookmarkId'
IF resource == 'bookmark' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'bookmarkId'
IF resource == 'bookmark' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'collectionId'
IF resource == 'bookmark' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'bookmark' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'bookmark' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'bookmarkId'
IF resource == 'bookmark' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'collection' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'collection' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF resource == 'collection' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'collection' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'collectionId'
IF resource == 'collection' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'collectionId'
IF resource == 'collection' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'type'
IF resource == 'collection' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'collection' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'collection' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'collectionId'
IF resource == 'collection' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'tag' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'tag' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'tags'
IF resource == 'tag' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'tag' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'tag' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'tag' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'self'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'get' AND self == False THEN SHOW parameter 'userId'
